title: Michael Cohen's Secret Trump Tape & Trump's Twitter Threat to Iran | Tip "T.I." Harris
itunes:title: Michael Cohen's Secret Trump Tape & Trump's Twitter Threat to Iran | Tip "T.I." Harris
description:
A waitress goes viral after body-slamming the man who groped her, President Trump threatens Iran via an all-caps tweet, and Tip "T.I." Harris chats about "The Grand Hustle."
